backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a Testimonial type and providing functions to add, retrieve by ID, and get all testimonials stored in a Map.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report documenting implemented features including eagle logo replacement, entrance animations, header alignment fixes, and responsive design optimizations with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing detailed summaries of all frontend component files describing their functionality, animations, styling, and responsive behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including colors, borders, and sidebar styling variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the SwiftOps Automation application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component that composes all page sections including navbar, hero, services, stats, integrations, client profiles, AI performance, CTA, contact, footer, and neon cursor effect.
frontend/src/components/AIPerformanceSec: Section displaying AI-driven performance metrics with animated counters, testimonial quote, and connected workflow visualization image with animated pulse nodes.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section rendering glassmorphism cards for name, phone, WhatsApp (with special green glow), Instagram, and email with icons, labels, and clickable links.
frontend/src/components/EagleClickAnimat: Implements a multi-stage fullscreen animation overlay featuring an eagle logo with fade, draw, expand, particles, pulse, scale, and fadeout effects triggered by user clicks.
frontend/src/components/EagleLogo.tsx: Renders an animated eagle logo with neon glow effects, hover interactions, and a one-time entrance animation tracked via sessionStorage.
frontend/src/components/EliteClientProfi: Displays a grid of three client testimonial cards with profile images, names, positions, and quotes, using intersection observer for fade-in animations.
Renders a call-to-action section with email input form and submit button featuring ripple effects and neon styling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a comprehensive footer with brand info, link columns (Company, Services, Resources, Legal), social media icons, contact details, and copyright information.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with parallax background, animated eagle logo, floating particles, headline text, and CTA buttons that trigger eagle click animations before scrolling to target sections.
frontend/src/components/HowItWorksSectio: Displays a three-step process section with animated cards showing how to connect systems, deploy AI agents, and automate workflows. Uses intersection observer for scroll-triggered animations and includes connecting lines between steps.
frontend/src/components/IntegrationsSect: Shows a horizontally scrolling marquee of integration logos (Slack, Google Workspace, etc.) with hover effects. Features an auto-scrolling animation displaying 10+ platform names.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Fixed navigation bar with logo, desktop/mobile menus, and smooth scroll navigation with active section highlighting. Includes eagle click animation on navigation and responsive design with hamburger menu for mobile.
frontend/src/components/NeonCursor.tsx: Custom cursor effect that displays a neon blue radial gradient following the mouse pointer on desktop devices only. Uses window resize listener to detect desktop viewport.
Grid layout displaying six service cards (AI Agents, Chatbots, Email Automation, etc.) with icons and descriptions. Uses intersection observer for staggered fade-in animations on scroll.
frontend/src/components/StatsSection.tsx: Displays four animated statistics (tasks automated, integrations, uptime, clients) in a responsive grid. Uses counter animation hook to animate numbers from zero to target values when visible.
frontend/src/hooks/useActiveSection.ts: Custom hook that tracks which section is currently visible in the viewport using IntersectionObserver. Returns the active section ID for navigation highlighting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor with authentication. Automatically recreates actor when identity changes and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCounterAnimation.t: Custom hook that animates a number from 0 to a target value over a specified duration using requestAnimationFrame. Triggered by a boolean flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for ICP integration. Manages login/logout flow, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntersectionObserv: Custom hook that returns a boolean indicating whether a referenced element is intersecting the viewport. Accepts threshold and rootMargin options for IntersectionObserver configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Custom React hook that returns a parallax offset value based on scroll position, multiplied by a configurable speed factor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for React Query hooks; currently unused as the website is static with no backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useRippleEffect.ts: Custom React hook that creates a Material Design-style ripple effect on click, dynamically generating and removing a ripple span element.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind imports, custom neon cyan theme variables, utility classes for neon effects, buttons, text shadows, and animations for a futuristic AI brand aesthetic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom neon cyan color palette, Orbitron/Inter fonts, border radius variables, and accordion animations for the SwiftOps brand.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking SwiftOps AI automation website features, including eagle logo requirements, entrance animations, responsive header fixes, and known layout issues.
